pullrequest.title: Disable tests compilation by default in cmake

content.raw: We could consider using a different name for the custom target to build the tests (`make tests`) if it's not readily distinct from `make test`. Something like `make all_tests`. DART uses `make tests`, but I'm confused with `make test` myself sometimes. Anyways, it's totally up to you.
content.html: We could consider using a different name for the custom target to build the tests (make tests) if it's not readily distinct from make test. Something like make all_tests. DART uses make tests, but I'm confused with make test myself sometimes. Anyways, it's totally up to you.
